      • getLoadedPlugins

        public ArrayList<Plugin> getLoadedPlugins()
        Gets the currently loaded MCForge plugins
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all the MCForge plugins currently loaded

      • findPlugin

        public Plugin findPlugin(String name)
        Look for a loaded plugin using part of/the full name of the plugin
        Parameters:
        name - part of or the full name of the plugin
        Returns:
        If more than 1 plugin is found, then null is returned. If no plugin is found, then null is returned. If a plugin is found, then the loaded plugin is returned.

      • getExtensions

        public ArrayList<ClassicExtension> getExtensions()
        Gets the currently loaded Classic extensions
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all the Classic extensions currently loaded
